## project() function

Obtain metadata for the current GCP Project.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function project<T = any>(options?: string | Options): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | string \| [Options](./gcp-metadata.options.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T&gt;

## Example


```js
const gcpMetadata = require('gcp-metadata');

// fetch all metadata for the project
const projectMetadata = await gcpMetadata.project();

// fetch the current projectId from the metadata server
const projectId = await gcpMetadata.project('project-id');

```
